verses.verse: Who <WH4310> is as the wise<WH2450> man? and who<WH4310> knoweth<WH3045> the interpretation<WH6592> of a thing?<WH1697> a man's<WH120> wisdom<WH2451> maketh his face<WH6440> to shine,<WH215> and the boldness<WH5797> of his face<WH6440> shall be changed.<WH8132>
I <WH589> counsel thee to keep<WH8104> the king's<WH4428> commandment,<WH6310> and that in regard<WH5921> <WH1700> of the oath<WH7621> of God.<WH430>

Be not<WH408> hasty<WH926> to go<WH1980> out of his sight:<WH4480> <WH6440> stand<WH5975> not<WH408> in an evil<WH7451> thing;<WH1697> for<WH3588> he doeth<WH6213> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> pleaseth<WH2654> him.
Where <WH834> the word<WH1697> of a king<WH4428> is, there is power:<WH7983> and who<WH4310> may say<WH559> unto him, What<WH4100> doest<WH6213> thou?

Whoso keepeth<WH8104> the commandment<WH4687> shall feel<WH3045> no<WH3808> evil<WH7451> thing:<WH1697> and a wise man's<WH2450> heart<WH3820> discerneth<WH3045> both time<WH6256> and judgment.<WH4941>
Because <WH3588> to every<WH3605> purpose<WH2656> there is<WH3426> time<WH6256> and judgment,<WH4941> therefore<WH3588> the misery<WH7451> of man<WH120> is great<WH7227> upon<WH5921> him.
For <WH3588> he knoweth<WH3045> not<WH369> that<WH4100> which shall be:<WH7945> <WH1961> for<WH3588> who<WH4310> can tell<WH5046> him when<WH834> it shall be?<WH1961>

There is no<WH369> man<WH120> that hath power<WH7989> over the spirit<WH7307> to retain<WH3607> <WH853> the spirit;<WH7307> neither<WH369> hath he power<WH7983> in the day<WH3117> of death:<WH4194> and there is no<WH369> discharge<WH4917> in that war;<WH4421> neither<WH3808> shall wickedness<WH7562> deliver<WH4422> <WH853> those that are given<WH1167> to it.

All <WH3605> this<WH2088> have I seen,<WH7200> and applied<WH5414> <WH853> my heart<WH3820> unto every<WH3605> work<WH4639> that<WH834> is done<WH6213> under<WH8478> the sun:<WH8121> there is a time<WH6256> wherein<WH834> one man<WH120> ruleth over<WH7980> another<WH120> to his own hurt.<WH7451>

And so<WH3651> I saw<WH7200> the wicked<WH7563> buried,<WH6912> who had come<WH935> and gone<WH1980> from the place<WH4480> <WH4725> of the holy,<WH6918> and they were forgotten<WH7911> in the city<WH5892> where<WH834> they had so<WH3651> done:<WH6213> this<WH2088> is also<WH1571> vanity.<WH1892>

Because <WH834> sentence against<WH6599> an evil<WH7451> work<WH4639> is not<WH369> executed<WH6213> speedily,<WH4120> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the heart<WH3820> of the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> is fully set<WH4390> in them to do<WH6213> evil.<WH7451>

Though <WH834> a sinner<WH2398> do<WH6213> evil<WH7451> a hundred times,<WH3967> and his days be prolonged,<WH748> yet<WH3588> surely<WH1571> I<WH589> know<WH3045> that<WH834> it shall be<WH1961> well<WH2896> with them that fear<WH3373> God,<WH430> which<WH834> fear<WH3372> before<WH4480> <WH6440> him:

But it shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> well<WH2896> with the wicked,<WH7563> neither<WH3808> shall he prolong<WH748> his days,<WH3117> which are as a shadow;<WH6738> because<WH834> he feareth<WH3372> not<WH369> before<WH4480> <WH6440> God.<WH430>

There is<WH3426> a vanity<WH1892> which<WH834> is done<WH6213> upon<WH5921> the earth;<WH776> that<WH834> there be<WH3426> just<WH6662> men, unto whom<WH834> <WH413> it happeneth<WH5060> according to the work<WH4639> of the wicked;<WH7563> again, there be<WH3426> wicked<WH7563> men, to<WH413> whom it happeneth<WH7945> <WH5060> according to the work<WH4639> of the righteous:<WH6662> I said<WH559> that this also<WH2088> <WH7945> <WH1571> is vanity.<WH1892>

Then I<WH589> commended<WH7623> <WH853> mirth,<WH8057> because<WH834> a man<WH120> hath no<WH369> better<WH2896> thing under<WH8478> the sun,<WH8121> than<WH3588> <WH518> to eat,<WH398> and to drink,<WH8354> and to be merry:<WH8055> for that<WH1931> shall abide<WH3867> with him of his labor<WH5999> the days<WH3117> of his life,<WH2416> which<WH834> God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> him under<WH8478> the sun.<WH8121>

When <WH834> I applied<WH5414> <WH853> mine heart<WH3820> to know<WH3045> wisdom,<WH2451> and to see<WH7200> <WH853> the business<WH6045> that<WH834> is done<WH6213> upon<WH5921> the earth:<WH776> (for<WH3588> also<WH1571> there is that neither<WH369> day<WH3117> nor night<WH3915> seeth<WH7200> sleep<WH8142> with his eyes: )<WH5869>

Then I beheld<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of God,<WH430> that<WH3588> a man<WH120> cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> find out<WH4672> <WH853> the work<WH4639> that<WH834> is done<WH6213> under<WH8478> the sun:<WH8121> because<WH7945> though<WH834> a man<WH120> labor<WH5998> to seek it out,<WH1245> yet he shall not<WH3808> find<WH4672> it; yea<WH1571> further; though<WH518> a wise<WH2450> man think<WH559> to know<WH3045> it, yet shall he not<WH3808> be able<WH3201> to find<WH4672> it.
